title.rendered: Running Armband for iPhone & Android(Up to 6.2”), Armband Phone Holder, Sweatproof Sports Armband with 2 Pocket…

content.rendered:
Specification
Color: Black
Suitable for crowd: Unisex
Sport Straps: Adjustable
Material: prime quality diving materials (comfortable and light-weight)
Applicable fashions: lower than 6.2 inches show display screen
Size: 9.5cm x 5cm x 18cm/3.74″ x 1.97″ x 7.09″

Package consists of：
1 x Running Armband
1 x Sport Wristband

Warm Tips
1. Please permit 1-3mm differs due to guide measurement.
2. If you will have any questions, please contact us in time. We will provide you with a passable reply inside 24 hours.

Make certain this matches by getting into your mannequin quantity.
【Large Capacity & 2 Separate Pockets】 9.5cm x 5cm x 18cm/3.74″ x 1.97″ x 7.09″. This Armband Phone Holder matches for most cell phones & gadgets with show lower than 6.2 inches. The working armband with two separate pockets to guarantee that there’s sufficient area for cell phones, wallets, keys, playing cards and different requirements. the separate zippered pockets of this sweatproof sports activities armband for easy accessibility and avoids the telephone being scratched by keys.
【Easy To Fix & Adjustable】Our Running Armband for iPhone & Android is Comfortable and breathable, it may preserve the Armband firmly cling to the arm with out loosening throughout the motion. The adjustable elastic band may be most stretched to 40 cm, appropriate for arms of assorted sizes from 28 to 40 cm. The working armband have two methods of sporting, which may be worn on the forearm and higher arm by adjusting the armband.
【Lightweight and Comfortable】This Running Armband Phone Holder manufactured from breathable and comfortable prime quality diving materials，which is comfortable and light-weight (solely 80g) and comfy to put on, no additional burden when working. The Running Armband is sweatproof and machine cleanable. You can wash it after exercising to preserve it clear. Be cautious to preserve it dry for the following use.
【Free Your Hands & Enjoy Music】The Running Armband with an additional headphone gap makes your wired headphones undergo simply, get pleasure from your favourite music and broadcast throughout workouts, Totally free your arms, handy and never bothering.
【Ideal Sports Partner For Women & Men】The working armband and 1 Sport Wristband is on the market for working, exercise, togging, cross coaching, mountaineering, biking, strolling, fitness center, horse driving and another outside sports activities. This Armband Phone Holder can be nice for all ages of Boys, Girls, Adults, Kids, Seniors, Mom, Dad and Teens.
(*2*)
